title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: EML-Based Science Learning Design Masterclass

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can visually design the learning flow of a science experiment module using IMS LD
Learners implement three or more interaction types (task submission/feedback/collaborative discussion) in mobile environments

Within one week, learners design an EML (Edge Machine Learning) model according to given requirements (image classification), convert it to TensorFlow Lite, and complete a project evaluable for execution on a Raspberry Pi 4 with 85% or higher accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
